channel.title: Jagex lies
channel.description:
We are aware that many players will have strong opinions about this change, [b]and as the players of the game we value your opinion[/b]
well that is the biggest lie i have ever seen. Also i love how they make a topic in the rants section so they cant simply delete it in a day and not care what people posted in it. So i know there are alot of topics about this but honestly i think rs is going downhill. I just want to know how many people think jagex is killing their own game.

item.title: Jagex lies
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:15, topic:163962”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=222685.msg1940459#msg1940459 date=1198119856]

Mod Mark H:

We are aware that many players will have strong opinions about this change, and as the players of the game we value your opinion

well that is the biggest lie i have ever seen. Also i love how they make a topic in the rants section so they cant simply delete it in a day and not care what people posted in it.

So i know there are alot of topics about this but honestly i think rs is going downhill. I just want to know how many people think jagex is killing their own game.

They do value our opinions, they just do not care about them.

lol i though value was the same as care just in smart talk

http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/value
http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/care

Seem different to me.
[/quote]

I value your opinion.

I care for your opinion.

seems like they are similar in the context.[/quote]

Your connotation of them are the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex lies
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:10, topic:163962”]Runescape has advanced alot since rsc, the only thing thats gone down is the community.
If the community as a whole were not wining kids, who expect their own way all the time. Then maybe, just maybe jagex may start listening because if they knew that the majority of the players were older, more sensible players they may start taking your suggestions, complaints and shit into consideration.

Having said that, they DO listen. For example i remember a few months after Pest control was released higher levels started complaining about how all the lower levels ruin it for them, people were suggestion different level boats. They did it.

There is not one update i have hated off jagex, most of them i see sense too.[/quote]

like guild wars…

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex lies
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Runescape has advanced alot since rsc, the only thing thats gone down is the community.
If the community as a whole were not wining kids, who expect their own way all the time. Then maybe, just maybe jagex may start listening because if they knew that the majority of the players were older, more sensible players they may start taking your suggestions, complaints and shit into consideration.

Having said that, they DO listen. For example i remember a few months after Pest control was released higher levels started complaining about how all the lower levels ruin it for them, people were suggestion different level boats. They did it.

There is not one update i have hated off jagex, most of them i see sense too.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex lies
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Lothy:

Only reason for botting now is to raise account stats, and such a large number of autoers are caught that most people refuse to auto on high leveled accounts. Autoing on low levels is more then likely to get you caught.

Nexus Pro? Come on.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex lies
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Well they have effectively rendered cheating useless for money.

Only reason for botting now is to raise account stats, and such a large number of autoers are caught that most people refuse to auto on high leveled accounts. Autoing on low levels is more then likely to get you caught.
